vegetables.name: Potato
vegetables.description: A light yellow starchy vegetable with a mild taste. You'll often find them stuck to the couch or aimlessly wandering down hallways.

vegetables.name: Brocolli
vegetables.description: An earthy tasting vege, almost grassy with a hint of bitterness. Brocolli's tend to be very green and environmental, you might catch one wearing crocs and pants made out of bamboo, sipping at green tea out of 'reusable coffee cup'.

vegetables.name: Cabbage
vegetables.description: We all know a cabbage when we see one, they can be very outgoing. But when you ask them a question, expect a few minutes of silence. They taste bitter and a bit like pepper

vegetables.name: Carrot
vegetables.description: Very good eyesight but at a cost, they have skin that looks like they've been in the tanning booth for days. Taste is between fruity, sweet and bitter - a very unique taste.

vegetables.name: Eggplant
vegetables.description: Everybody secretly aspires to be an eggplant. Eggplants are very confident and outgoing, and often say what is on their mind. But be aware eggplants are aroused easily so don't tempt them. When cooked are a creamy soft texture with a mild unusual savoury taste

vegetables.name: Cauliflower
vegetables.description: A little bit bland on their own, but put in a group they have the potential to be a flavour sensation! The Cauliflower has a great depth of sophistication beneath their unvaried appearance
